item.title: Unity 2D: Game Physics - Projectiles, Explosions and Shockwaves
item.description: Unity 2D project for Game Pysics course A Unity 2D project made by me and another student for our game physics course. The project uses our own projectile and explosion/shockwave physics. You control the tank with A and D to move, Q and E to angle the turret and W and S to increase/decrease the launch velocity of the projectile. Yuo can also change the gravity or how fast time passes by typing in the
